segments.text: I can't believe my eyes, the sink is flooding!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pouring out, and she's just drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress, right next to the spill.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is forming so quickly on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turning to the left, there's a boy on a stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the cookie jar, stool wobbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl beside him, arm up for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They look so coordinated in their sneakiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are open, framing the whole thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window highlights the garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how unaware the mom is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in a big mess or worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a unexpected scene in such a normal kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
